name: Lars' Hydroponics Station
Lore: 'Grows fruits and vegetables. Very efficient water use. Often underground. Feeds moisture farm families, but excess vegetables are often sold at markets.',
Text: 'Deploy on a farm. During your draw phase, while no ''crop'' here, may use 1 Force to stack a ''crop'' (any one card from Lost Pile) on this device. While you occupy this site, if any just drawn destiny matches destiny of ''crop'', may place ''crop'' in your Used Pile.',
